edicines also are used to raise the platelet count. Some are given through a needle inserted into a vein. These medicines include rituximab, immune globulin, and anti-Rh (D) immunoglobulin.
                
Medicines also may be used with a procedure to remove the spleen called splenectomy (splee-NECK-tuh-mee).
                
If medicines or splenectomy don't help, two newer medicineseltrombopag and romiplostimcan be used to treat ITP.
